questions.question: This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
Taking place on a mysterious, moving island, this arc introduces the Mink Tribe and reveals new information about the world. What is...?
This ability, often used by Monkey D. Luffy, drastically increases his speed and power, and changes his skin to a reddish color. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This leader of the Beasts Pirates, known for his immense strength and Dragon-Dragon Fruit power, is one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. Who is...?
